p.span: For each event, generates the compatibility index (cix) of a field and returns the compatibility index for each data value and concept.
... | xsGetCompatibility Height IN MyHeight BY Male SCOPED private
Generates the compatibility index for each Height value in each concept from the context 'Height' in the container 'MyHeight' with class 'Male' in the scope 'private' .
The field in each event to generate the compatibility index in the container/context/class/scope.
If specified, use this as the context instead of 'field'
The name of the container containing the context.
The scope (private, app, global) where the container is stored.
Each event has the compatibility index (cix) value of 'field' added for each concept in the specified Context.
